project_type.name: Linux Application Debug
project_type.description: This allows Linux application debug using gdbserver.

execution_environment.name: gdbserver (TCP)
execution_environment.description: Connect to a platform running gdbserver using a TCP connection.

activity.name: Download and debug application
activity.description: Arm Debugger will download your application to the target system and then start a new gdbserver session to debug the application. This configuration requires ssh and gdbserver on the target platform.

activity.name: Start gdbserver and debug target resident application
activity.description: Arm Debugger will connect to the target and start a new gdbserver session to debug an application already present on the target system. This configuration requires ssh and gdbserver on the target platform.

activity.name: Connect to already running gdbserver
activity.description: Arm Debugger will connect to an already running gdbserver on the target system.
